I am from a place where rain is always welcome.

content.text: I am doing well, thank you for asking. How about you?
I am doing well, thank you! I am just about to make some lasagna for dinner.
That sounds delicious! I love lasagna! What is your favorite kind?
I love a traditional lasagna made with ricotta cheese and mozzarella.
That sounds delicious! I love ricotta cheese. What kind of sauce do you use?
I use a homemade marinara sauce.
That sounds amazing! I love homemade sauce. I am not a huge fan of store bought sauce.
Me neither. It is so much better to make it from scratch.
I agree. I love to cook, but I do not always have time to make everything from scratch.
I know what you mean. I try to make as much as I can from scratch, but sometimes I just do not have the time.
I am the same way. I am glad to hear that you are a fellow lasagna lover!
Me too! It is one of my favorite foods.
Do you have any other favorite foods?
I love Italian food in general. I also love pizza, pasta, and bread.
I love Italian food too! I am not a huge fan of pizza, but I love pasta and bread.
I love the variety of Italian food. There is something for everyone.
I agree. It is one of my favorite cuisines
